resources.string:
Do you know how to use the application "TodoList"?

 This Activity lets you understand how it works in a simple tutorial.

 At the end of the page you will be able to access the documentation and the code source of the "Todolist".
This is the main page of the application allowing to see/list/create/delete its tasks.
This is the floating action menu allowing you to choose whant you want to do.
If you want to add a new Task without precisions (basic description of the task), tap on it and name your task.
You can add a task that contains name, description, date and hour precisions.
